DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomize trial include 136 anovulatory woman CC-resistant PCOS among attend Gynecology Outpatient Clinics , Benha University Hospital , private practice setting , Alkalubia , Egypt August 2012 August 2014 . The study protocol approve Local Ethics Committee write informed consent obtain study commence . Diagnosis PCOS base Rotterdam criterion ( 18 ) , whereby diagnosis PCOS require presence two three criterion exclusion etiology , i.e. , oligomenorrhea and/or anovulation , clinical and/or biochemical sign hyperandrogenism , and/or polycystic ovary ultrasound . Inclusion criterion : 1- Age : 18-35 year . 2- Period infertility > 2 year . 3- Serum level FSH < 10 U/L early follicular phase . 4- All woman CC-resistant PCOS , fail ovulate dose CC 150 mg/day 5 day per cycle least three consecutive cycle . 5- All woman patent Fallopian tube prove hysterosalpingography laparoscopy partner satisfy normal parameter semen analysis accord modify WHO criterion ( 19 ) . Exclusion criterion : 1- Infertility due cause CC- resistant PCOS due combine factor . 2- Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥35 Kg/m² . 3- The use metformin , gonadotropin , hormonal contraception diet regimen within last 6 month . 4- Women congenital adrenal hyperplasia , hyperprolactinaemia abnormal thyroid function . 5- Hypersensitivity contraindication Letrozole clomiphene treatment . 6- Previous LOD . The study start two month last CC treatment cycle eliminate post-treatment effect CC . At admission , thorough evaluation participant carry via history take physical examination , include anthropometric measurement . A baseline transvaginal ultrasound examination do use 7-10 MHZ probe ( Voluson 730 PRO V , GE Healthcare , USA ) measure endometrial thickness exclude pelvic pathology treatment . Basal hormonal assay perform day 3 spontaneous progestin induced cycle include measurement serum concentration luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) , testosterone . Randomization do accord computer generate random numerical table two equal group . Treatment allocation conceal use sequentially number opaque seal envelope . Envelopes open consecutively third person ( study nurse ) , assign patient extended Clomiphene Citrate group ( Group A ) LOD group ( Group B ) . Once allocate , treatment reveal investigator patient . Group B ( n =68 ) underwent LOD . Laparoscopy perform general anesthesia , use three-puncture technique . Each ovary cauterize perpendicular antimesenteric border four point , 4 second 40 W mixed current , use monopolar electrosurgical needle ( Karl Storz , ND , Germany ) . Each puncture 4 mm diameter 6-8 mm depth . The ovary cooled irrigation normal saline solution . Any , intraoperative postoperative complication report . The follow-up start next cycle ovarian drill 6 month . Starting cycle day 9 , ultrasound scan repeat daily monitor follicle growth ( number mean diameter ) . When optimal follicle size reach ( i.e . mean follicular diameter ≥ 18 mm ) , HCG 10,000 IU ( Epifasi , EPICO , Egypt ) give intramuscular trigger ovulation .
